#summary UseCase: LeaveClass
#labels UseCase,Student

==UseCases==


= LeaveClass =


|| Use Case || LeaveClass ||
||Identified || S2 ||
|| Description: || The LeaveClass use case models Student removing membership status for a Class. ||
||Actors|| Student||
|| Preconditions: || 1. Student is logged in via the LogIn use case. ||
||Flow of Events: ||1. The use case starts when Student selects View Active Classes.||
||                ||2. The system will display a list of Student's current Classes. ||
||                ||3. Student selects "Drop Class" for a chosen class. ||
||                ||4. The system will display a confirmation/warning message. ||
||                ||4.1 The Student chooses "Confirm".  The system displays a confirmation message. ||
||                ||4.2 The Student chooses "Cancel".  ||
||                ||5. The Student will be returned to the View Active Classes screen.  ||
||Post Condition:|| 1. If a Class was dropped, it will no longer be displayed on the screen, and Student will no longer be associated with that Class.||
